snippet.title: 3 Game Pack!: The Game of Life + Payday + Yahtzee - Game Boy Advance Gameplay
snippet.description:
Released in 2005 for the Game Boy Advance, this compilation gives us The Game of Life, Payday and Yahtzee into one single cartridge.

The Game of Life
Practice makes perfect in THE GAME OF LIFE. Will you go to college or join the working force? Will you get married and have kids? Will you go bankrupt, or earn millions in stock and real estate? Anything's possible with a spin of the Life wheel!

Yahtzee
A family favorite for over 40 years! Throw the dice to build straights, full houses, five of a kind-YAHTZEE!

Payday
PAYDAY is the classic family game that makes househould finances fun. In the end, what's left does count because whoever has the most money after all the bills and loans are paid WINS!

The Game of Life, Payday, Yahtzee (C) Hasbro
Developed by Black Lantern Studios
Published by Destination Software (US) and Zoo Digital Publishing (EU)

#theforeseenarcade #retrogames #retrogaming #hasbro #boardgame #gba #gameboyadvance #nintendo #thegameoflife #yahtzee #payday

NOTE: Payday has a glitch that can cause the game to crash when emulated. The reason is due to the game's memory for Payday getting mixed up with The Game of Life. If you are going to play a full six month game, make sure to pause frequently to check if the score of any player doesn't have a huge negative number on a turn.
